text:
Oak Studios | New York, NY | Full-time or Interns

Oak is an independent product studio and consultancy based in NYC. Our products include Dropmark (http://dropmark.com) and Siteleaf (http://siteleaf.com).

We are hiring:

- Full-Time Backend Developer: http://www.siteleaf.com/blog/join-our-team/

- Intern: http://oak.is/thinking/intern

Specifically looking for developers who have a passion for product design.

Stack: Ruby, Sinatra, Jekyll, GitHub, MongoDB, Redis, SQL, AWS, JS, React, Sass, Swift
